post.title: $1300 to spend on black friday. suggestions?
post.content: hey everyone- the wife gave me the go ahead on a new tv purchase. i have $1300 to spend and want to go big!. this most likely mean rear projection. i know circuit city is selling the wd-65735 for $1199 and i am seriously considering it. does anyone have any suggestions for a 60"+ screen in the price range. i deffinately want 1080p and at least 3 hdmi inputs. i havent found a better set for the price. any feeback/suggestions? thanks, sc
